name: Don't Wake Up (Choof, BuiHuy)
description:
Made for the CGX GradJam 2021

In "Don't Wake Up" the player destroy all the demon babies before you have a nightmare and wake up. After clearing a level, run to the bed to start the next scene before the timer ends. All level's are auto generated, and demon babies use pathfinding to navigate.

How to Play:

You are dreaming, and you must defeat all the demon babies before they wake you up.

1.  Move (WASD)

2. Shoot the demon babies (LMB)

3. Flying kick the demon babies when they're lit (WASD + Space)

4. Go back to sleep

Don't let the timer run out.
